liquidity with provided Dai by borrowing eDai with some of the Dai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(daiUsed)`","params":{"daiUsed":"amount of Dai to use to mint liquidity. ","maxEDai":"maximum amount of eDai to be borrowed to mint liquidity. "},"returns":{"_0":"The amount of liquidity tokens minted.  "}},"authorizePool(address,address,bytes,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Given a pool and 3 signatures, it `permit`'s dai and eDai for that pool and adds it as a delegate"},"borrowDaiForMaximumEDai(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Borrow eDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum eDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","daiToBorrow":"Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","maximumEDai":"Maximum amount of EDai to borrow.","to":"Wallet to send the resulting Dai to."}},"borrowMinimumDaiForEDai(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Borrow eDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, if a minimum amount of Dai can be obtained such. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","eDaiToBorrow":"Amount of eDai to borrow.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","minimumDaiToBorrow":"Minimum amount of Dai that should be borrowed.","to":"Wallet to sent the resulting Dai to."}},"buyDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Buy Dai for eDai","params":{"daiOut":"Amount of dai being bought","maxEDaiIn":"Maximum amount of eDai being sold","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought"}},"buyDaiWithSignature(address,address,uint128,uint128,bytes)":{"details":"Buy Dai for eDai and permits infinite eDai to the pool","params":{"daiOut":"Amount of dai being bought","maxEDaiIn":"Maximum amount of eDai being sold","signature":"The `permit` call's signature","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought"}},"buyEDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Buy eDai for dai","params":{"eDaiOut":"Amount of eDai being bought","maxDaiIn":"Maximum amount of dai being sold","to":"Wallet receiving the eDai being bought"}},"daiForEDai(address,uint256)":{"details":"Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating eDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO"},"eDaiForDai(address,uint256)":{"details":"Amount of eDai debt that will result from migrating Dai debt from MakerDAO to Yield"},"executeOnFlashMint(address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Callback from `EDai.flashMint()`"},"makerToYield(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Transfer debt and collateral from MakerDAO to Yield Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });","params":{"daiAmount":"dai debt to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Denominated in Dai (= art * rate)","pool":"The pool to trade in (and therefore eDai series to borrow)","user":"Vault to migrate.","wethAmount":"weth to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in Yield, and low enough to make sure that debt left in MakerDAO is also collateralized."}},"onboard(address,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Performs the initial onboarding of the user. It `permit`'s DAI to be used by the proxy, and adds the proxy as a delegate in the controller"},"post(address)":{"details":"Users use `post` in YieldProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.","params":{"to":"Yield Vault to deposit collateral in."}},"removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Burns tokens and repays debt with proceedings. Sells any excess eDai for Dai, then returns all Dai, and if there is no debt in the Controller, all posted Chai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`","params":{"minimumEDaiPrice":"minimum Dai/eDai price to be accepted when internally selling eDai.","poolTokens":"amount of pool tokens to burn. "}},"removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool(address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Burns tokens and sells Dai proceedings for eDai. Pays as much debt as possible, then sells back any remaining eDai for Dai. Then returns all Dai, and if there is no debt in the Controller, all posted Chai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`","params":{"minimumDaiPrice":"minimum eDai/Dai price to be accepted when internally selling Dai.","minimumEDaiPrice":"minimum Dai/eDai price to be accepted when internally selling eDai.","poolTokens":"amount of pool tokens to burn. "}},"removeLiquidityMature(address,uint256)":{"details":"Burns tokens and repays eDai debt after Maturity.  Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`","params":{"poolTokens":"amount of pool tokens to burn."}},"repayDaiWithSignature(bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Burns Dai from caller to repay debt in a Yield Vault. User debt is decreased for the given collateral and eDai series, in Yield vault `to`. The amount of debt repaid changes according to series maturity and MakerDAO rate and chi, depending on collateral type. `A signature is provided as a parameter to this function, so that `dai.approve()` doesn't need to be called.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","daiAmount":"Amount of Dai to use for debt repayment.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","signature":"The `permit` call's signature","to":"Yield vault to repay debt for."}},"repayEDaiDebtForMaximumDai(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Repay an amount of eDai debt in Controller using Dai exchanged for eDai at pool rates, up to a maximum amount of Dai spent. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`. If `eDaiRepayment` exceeds the existing debt, only the necessary eDai will be used.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","eDaiRepayment":"Amount of eDai debt to repay.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","maximumRepaymentInDai":"Maximum amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.","to":"Yield Vault to repay eDai debt for."}},"repayMinimumEDaiDebtForDai(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Repay an amount of eDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for eDai at pool rates, with a minimum of eDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`. If `repaymentInDai` exceeds the existing debt, only the necessary Dai will be used.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","minimumEDaiRepayment":"Minimum amount of eDai debt to repay.","repaymentInDai":"Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.","to":"Yield Vault to repay eDai debt for."}},"sellDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Sell Dai for eDai","params":{"daiIn":"Amount of dai being sold","minEDaiOut":"Minimum amount of eDai being bought","to":"Wallet receiving the eDai being bought"}},"sellEDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Sell eDai for Dai","params":{"eDaiIn":"Amount of eDai being sold","minDaiOut":"Minimum amount of dai being bought","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought"}},"wethForDai(uint256)":{"details":"Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of dai in MakerDAO"},"wethForEDai(uint256)":{"details":"Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of eDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula."},"withdraw(address,uint256)":{"details":"Users wishing to withdraw their Weth as ETH from the Controller should use this function. Users must have called `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)` to authorize YieldProxy to act in their behalf.","params":{"amount":"Amount of weth to move.","to":"Wallet to send Eth to."}},"yieldToMaker(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Transfer debt and collateral from Yield to MakerDAO Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });","params":{"eDaiAmount":"eDai debt to move from Yield to MakerDAO.","pool":"The pool to trade in (and therefore eDai series to migrate)","user":"Vault to migrate.","wethAmount":"weth to move from Yield to MakerDAO. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in MakerDAO, and low enough to make sure that debt left in Yield is also collateralized."}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/peripheral/YieldProxy.sol":"YieldProxy"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/helpers/DecimalMath.sol":{"keccak256":"0x545e736a020020c14d831bd44b657d6c9408b0290d669ec97fc820647bcef4a3","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://984a382c5b301f37233b9c7e157bd303219e3069f756057c876c5ba42db239e9","dweb:/ipfs/QmNgCQTepE6VsWfPD1JQiMCpjEdHtMHqRbmzNQ1ednZKxR"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IChai.sol":{"keccak256":"0x274406cc83891f276fc3fcfdd4503f6dfc2fb83c0d36aba01c0e89647cce190a","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://61f45d927bc2d197305c1b2b266a65900195b5e74f46993553323f600c9566e5","dweb:/ipfs/QmWByxVYejuFsXfqiVdNaA1BTSuv1zsvhmvJssRGPLrYPi"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IController.sol":{"keccak256":"0x829bd374722d81829ef57e86d9f189fff017005c530be32f3edc419204101a81","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://d3ff2b35a761c59aa420718472cf1622292f112db363bbcf3763e507bbcfaba0","dweb:/ipfs/QmThJks6knHghECMMHqPqAsGDbiRzp8qiSwR6ouzEfthCb"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IDai.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8adee8bf1d9fccc50e166167b0fdaa9fad756dedd7ff17947043473db40b9bdc","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://da2ad804931a02f4bb67fa0f3d57cd3d0e6aa964724c78b55030f78136093b5a","dweb:/ipfs/QmUE8GZJVv4KJzLRzGpuLhooJ8ZbHnAwbEyrV61zhuvpJe"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IDaiJoin.sol":{"keccak256":"0x5304a4ea3376c41b4d72b7f1630f20ba234d3f3a46b1559471e2d828bcf7002f","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://b5cf7b0d7c95c471188869fe6a6e33ebc22fa45972511f3484baade9aee9fe93","dweb:/ipfs/QmZwmGA3w91piL9D7yaiRwtdUhNzdb5FZDSGH634EdhB2s"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/inte ls":["bzz-raw://efdc632af6960cf865dbc113665ea1f5b90eab75cc40ec062b2f6ae6da582017","dweb:/ipfs/QmfAZFDuG62vxmAN9DnXApv7e7PMzPqi4RkqqZHLMSQiY5"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text: @dev Safe casting from uint256 to uint128
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to int256
@dev Unpack r, s and v from a `bytes` signature
@dev Performs the initial onboarding of the user. It `permit`'s DAI to be used by the proxy, and adds the proxy as a delegate in the controller
@dev Given a pool and 3 signatures, it `permit`'s dai and eDai for that pool and adds it as a delegate
@dev The WETH9 contract will send ether to YieldProxy on `weth.withdraw` using this function.

@dev Users use `post` in YieldProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.
 @param to Yield Vault to deposit collateral in.
@dev Return to caller all posted chai if there is no debt, converted to dai, plus any dai remaining in the contract.

@dev Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of eDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula.

@dev Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating eDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO

documentation.text: @dev Callback from `EDai.flashMint()`
@dev Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of dai in MakerDAO
@dev Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of eDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula.
@dev Amount of eDai debt that will result from migrating Dai debt from MakerDAO to Yield
@dev Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating eDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO

addLiquidity(address,uint256,uint256).details: Mints liquidity with provided Dai by borrowing eDai with some of the Dai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(daiUsed)`

params.daiUsed: amount of Dai to use to mint liquidity.
params.maxEDai: maximum amount of eDai to be borrowed to mint liquidity.

returns._0: The amount of liquidity tokens minted.

authorizePool(address,address,bytes,byte.details: Given a pool and 3 signatures, it `permit`'s dai and eDai for that pool and adds it as a delegate

borrowDaiForMaximumEDai(address,bytes32,.details: Borrow eDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum eDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.

params.daiToBorrow: Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.
params.maximumEDai: Maximum amount of EDai to borrow.
params.to: Wallet to send the resulting Dai to.

borrowMinimumDaiForEDai(address,bytes32,.details: Borrow eDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, if a minimum amount of Dai can be obtained such. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`.

params.minimumDaiToBorrow: Minimum amount of Dai that should be borrowed.
params.to: Wallet to sent the resulting Dai to.

params.maxEDaiIn: Maximum amount of eDai being sold
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

buyDaiWithSignature(address,address,uint.details: Buy Dai for eDai and permits infinite eDai to the pool

params.maxEDaiIn: Maximum amount of eDai being sold
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

params.maxDaiIn: Maximum amount of dai being sold
params.to: Wallet receiving the eDai being bought

daiForEDai(address,uint256).details: Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating eDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO

eDaiForDai(address,uint256).details: Amount of eDai debt that will result from migrating Dai debt from MakerDAO to Yield

makerToYield(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Transfer debt and collateral from MakerDAO to Yield Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });

params.daiAmount: dai debt to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Denominated in Dai (= art * rate)
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore eDai series to borrow)
params.wethAmount: weth to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in Yield, and low enough to make sure that debt left in MakerDAO is also collateralized.

onboard(address,bytes,bytes).details: Performs the initial onboarding of the user. It `permit`'s DAI to be used by the proxy, and adds the proxy as a delegate in the controller

post(address).details: Users use `post` in YieldProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.

params.to: Yield Vault to deposit collateral in.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiFixed(address,uin.details: Burns tokens and repays debt with proceedings. Sells any excess eDai for Dai, then returns all Dai, and if there is no debt in the Controller, all posted Chai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`

params.minimumEDaiPrice: minimum Dai/eDai price to be accepted when internally selling eDai.
params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

removeLiquidityEarlyDaiPool(address,uint.details: Burns tokens and sells Dai proceedings for eDai. Pays as much debt as possible, then sells back any remaining eDai for Dai. Then returns all Dai, and if there is no debt in the Controller, all posted Chai. Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` and `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`

params.minimumDaiPrice: minimum eDai/Dai price to be accepted when internally selling Dai.
params.minimumEDaiPrice: minimum Dai/eDai price to be accepted when internally selling eDai.
params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

removeLiquidityMature(address,uint256).details: Burns tokens and repays eDai debt after Maturity.  Caller must have approved the proxy using`controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy)` Caller must have approved the liquidity burn with `pool.approve(poolTokens)`

params.poolTokens: amount of pool tokens to burn.

repayDaiWithSignature(bytes32,uint256,ad.details: Burns Dai from caller to repay debt in a Yield Vault. User debt is decreased for the given collateral and eDai series, in Yield vault `to`. The amount of debt repaid changes according to series maturity and MakerDAO rate and chi, depending on collateral type. `A signature is provided as a parameter to this function, so that `dai.approve()` doesn't need to be called.

params.daiAmount: Amount of Dai to use for debt repayment.
params.to: Yield vault to repay debt for.

repayEDaiDebtForMaximumDai(address,bytes.details: Repay an amount of eDai debt in Controller using Dai exchanged for eDai at pool rates, up to a maximum amount of Dai spent. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`. If `eDaiRepayment` exceeds the existing debt, only the necessary eDai will be used.

params.eDaiRepayment: Amount of eDai debt to repay.
params.maximumRepaymentInDai: Maximum amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay eDai debt for.

repayMinimumEDaiDebtForDai(address,bytes.details: Repay an amount of eDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for eDai at pool rates, with a minimum of eDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)`. If `repaymentInDai` exceeds the existing debt, only the necessary Dai will be used.

params.minimumEDaiRepayment: Minimum amount of eDai debt to repay.
params.repaymentInDai: Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay eDai debt for.

params.minEDaiOut: Minimum amount of eDai being bought
params.to: Wallet receiving the eDai being bought

params.minDaiOut: Minimum amount of dai being bought
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

wethForDai(uint256).details: Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of dai in MakerDAO

wethForEDai(uint256).details: Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of eDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Users wishing to withdraw their Weth as ETH from the Controller should use this function. Users must have called `controller.addDelegate(yieldProxy.address)` to authorize YieldProxy to act in their behalf.

yieldToMaker(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Transfer debt and collateral from Yield to MakerDAO Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });

params.eDaiAmount: eDai debt to move from Yield to MakerDAO.
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore eDai series to migrate)
params.wethAmount: weth to move from Yield to MakerDAO. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in MakerDAO, and low enough to make sure that debt left in Yield is also collateralized.
